Pre-Game Insights: Many players involved in the 2016 game have retired, while some remain, making the memories of that contest fresh.
Bangladesh wouldn't like to talk about the 2016 game, while India would like to believe they have evolved into a stronger outfit.
India ran into some problems against South Africa, with Lungi Ngidi exploiting the Perth pitch well.
Bangladesh has lost just one T20I against India in all their encounters.
Taskin Ahmed is the standout performer, taking eight wickets in the Super 12s, including two Player-of-the-Match awards.
Bangladesh's Najmul Hossain Shanto made a career-best 71 against Zimbabwe, but questions remain on how they finish innings.
Playing Yuzvendra Chahal could be a good idea against Bangladesh, who traditionally don't like facing legspin.
India have won their only T20I at the Adelaide Oval, beating Australia by 37 runs in 2016.
Bangladesh have also won their only international match at the Adelaide Oval, their famous 15-run win over England in the 2015 World Cup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain forecast for the evening could play spoilsport on the match.
Suryakumar Yadav is on 935 runs in 2022, and is set to become the second men's batter to get 1000-plus runs in a calendar year.
